# ===== Optional System Dependencies Notes =====
# For proper functionality of OCR and PDF image processing, install:
# 1. Tesseract OCR: https://github.com/tesseract-ocr/tesseract
# 2. Poppler: https://poppler.freedesktop.org/
# 
# Update paths in crm_module/Unstructured_ragging/config.py:
# TESSERACT_CMD = r"C:\Program Files\Tesseract-OCR\tesseract.exe"  # Windows
# POPPLER_PATH = r"C:\poppler-25.07.0\Library\bin"  # Windows
